nodes.text: The Stormblade Bloodfest was a gladiatorial competition. By the early years of the Galactic Empire's reign, the Houk gladiator Borbig Drob had claimed victory at the Bloodfest on nine occasions. These victories were mentioned by the Pa'lowick announcer at Gladiator Night, another gladiatorial event Drob took part in on the planet Lothal.
The Stormblade Bloodfest was first mentioned in Ezra's Gamble, a junior novel written by Ryder Windham and released in 2014.
